metadata.title: CVE-2014-9651 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in CHICKEN 4.9.0.x before 4.9.0.2, 4.9.x before 4.9.1, andbefore 5.0 allows attackers to have unspecified impact via a positive STARTargument to the "substring-index[-ci] procedures."

criterions.comment: chicken: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
